verbose_text: Thirty-three patients <=40 years with diagnosis of colorectal cancer and 41 patients with disease at> 60 years of age were investigated for MSI, Mismatch Repair proteins expression, KRAS and BRAF mutations, hypermethylation, and LINE-1 hypomethylation.
evidence: MSI, Mismatch Repair proteins expression, KRAS and BRAF mutations, hypermethylation, and LINE-1 hypomethylation
